title: Finalist, Technical Track
description: Singlehandedly placed top 9 overall and top 5 on the technical track at the Caffeine hackathon, 80+ participants at large

title: Runner-up, Empowerment Track
description: A part of a team of 3 who placed 2nd on the empowerment track at the Sparkhacks hackathon, 180+ participants at large

title: Winner, Best Technology Award
description: Awarded to the team with the most advanced/creative use of technology at the Wildhacks hackathon, 250+ participants at large

title: Weingartner Scholarship
description: Awarded to exceptional members of the Church who volunteer and support the Rockford community regularly

title: UIC Logmaster CS Scholarship
description: Awarded to students who have demonstrated computer science academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: UIC Victor & Lucy Kan Scholarship
description: Awarded to students who have demonstrated multi-disciplinary academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: UIC P. V. Sudhindra Scholarship
description: Awarded to students who have demonstrated multi-disciplinary academic excellence at the University of Illinois Chicago

title: AP Capstone Diploma
description: Awarded to students who earn scores of 3 or higher on AP Seminar, AP Research, and 4 additional AP Exams of their choosing

title: AP Scholar
description: Awarded to students who receive scores of 3 or higher on 3 or more AP Exams
